body_html: @ezyang I think the correct way of dealing with this is to detect whether we are compiling with this flag in torch/CMakeLists.txt and then passing that information into the generated TorchConfig.cmake (which gets configure_file-d here: https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/CMakeLists.txt#L468), such that it would only be set in your library if its set in libtorch. For this I need more context on how we are adding this flag when compiling our conda package. CC @soumith
